seasonFocus.title: Season Focus
seasonFocus.subtitle: Choose a focus to shape your season narrative and expectations.

scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.description: Prioritize goals and finishing. Club expectations will lean toward goal output.

playmaking.title: Playmaking
playmaking.description: Prioritize assists and chance creation. Expectations lean toward assists.

titles.title: Titles
titles.description: Focus on winning trophies. Team expectations become more important.

development.title: Development
development.description: Focus on improving your overall and attributes this season.

consistency.title: Consistency
consistency.description: Aim for strong average performances and reliability.

awardsSection.continentalCupPOTY: European Club Cup Player of the Tournament

setup.modeDynamicDesc: Fast simulation. Decisions are made automatically.
setup.modeTacticalDesc: Game pauses at key moments for your decisions.

expectations.goalsLeagueDesc: Score goals for {{club}} this season. The club expects production.
expectations.goalsLeagueMidDesc: Contribute goals for {{club}}. Even midfielders should find the net.
expectations.assistsLeagueDesc: Create chances and provide assists for {{club}} this season.
expectations.assistsLeagueMidDesc: Be the creative engine for {{club}}. Assists are your currency.
expectations.consistencyDesc: Maintain consistent performances for {{club}}. Reliability is key.
expectations.gkRatingDesc: Deliver strong goalkeeping performances for {{club}} this season.

team.leagueFinishDesc: Club expectation: finish the league season on target with {{club}}.

promises.roleGuaranteeDesc: Promise to {{club}}: be treated as {{status}}. Expected playing time: {{matches}}+ matches this season.

records.historicSeasonGoalsDesc: Historic chase: 91+ goals in a single season. The entire football world is watching.
records.clubSeasonGoalsBrokenDesc: Record broken: new {{club}} season goal record ({{record}}).

goals.becomeClubLegend: Become a club legend at {team} ({matches}/200 matches)
goals.winContinentalCup: Win the European Club Cup with {team}
goals.firstTrophy: Win first major trophy (league or continental)

Speed Merchant.name: Speed Merchant
Speed Merchant.description: Pure pace to leave defenders in the dust.

Chip Shot.name: Chip Shot
Chip Shot.description: Ability to lob the goalkeeper with subtle touches.

Outside Foot Shot.name: Outside Foot Shot
Outside Foot Shot.description: Uses the outside of the foot for shots and passes with spin.

Long Shot Taker.name: Long Shot Taker
Long Shot Taker.description: Likes to take shots from outside the box.

One-on-One Specialist.name: One-on-One Specialist
One-on-One Specialist.description: Lethal when one-on-one with the goalkeeper.

Acrobatic Finisher.name: Acrobatic Finisher
Acrobatic Finisher.description: Scores goals with volleys and bicycle kicks.

Speed Dribbler.name: Speed Dribbler
Speed Dribbler.description: Carries the ball at high speed without losing control.

Technical Dribbler.name: Technical Dribbler
Technical Dribbler.description: Short, precise dribbles in tight spaces.

Trickster.name: Trickster
Trickster.description: Uses feints and tricks to fool defenders.

Through Ball.name: Through Ball
Through Ball.description: Vision for passes that split the defense.

Tackles Back.name: Tackles Back
Tackles Back.description: Forward who helps win the ball back.

Rushes Out Of Goal.name: Rushes Out Of Goal
Rushes Out Of Goal.description: Goalkeeper who rushes out to close down angles.

Punches Fists.name: Punches Fists
Punches Fists.description: Prefers to punch the ball away.

One-on-One Rush.name: One-on-One Rush
One-on-One Rush.description: Quick to close down space in one-on-one situations.

Aerial Threat.name: Aerial Threat
Aerial Threat.description: Very dangerous from offensive set pieces.

Left-Footed Maestro.name: Left-Footed Maestro
Left-Footed Maestro.description: Exceptional skill with the left foot.

Right-Footed Sniper.name: Right-Footed Sniper
Right-Footed Sniper.description: Lethal accuracy with the right foot.

Cautious With Crosses.name: Cautious With Crosses
Cautious With Crosses.description: Hesitates to come out for crosses.

Inflexible.name: Inflexible
Inflexible.description: Struggles playing out of position or in different tactics.

common.dynamicActivityZones: Field areas where the player is most active during matches
common.noCompetitionData: No competition data available for this season

pos.1: Fans already call him an idol √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù delivery and intensity high.
pos.2: "Another lesson in {style}." Average {rating} speaks for itself.
pos.3: Crowd says he's carrying the {team} √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù {gpg} G/90, {apg} A/90.

neu.2: "Underrated without the ball" √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù pressure and support stand out.
neu.3: Constant production: {goals} G, {assists} A. Next step: killer instinct.

neg.1: "Needs to decide in big games" √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù fans want more decisive actions.
neg.2: End product below expected √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù consistency in question.
neg.3: Is the {style} role ideal? Debate heats up among fans.

shots.1: Makes numbers against weak teams √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù disappears when it matters.
shots.2: All hype, little impact √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù numbers deceive.
shots.3: Overrated √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù system player who doesn't carry the team.

pos.1: Commentators highlight movement and timing √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù looks like a complete {position}.
pos.2: Analysts point to shot selection and chance creation at elite level.

neu.1: Commentators see constant growth; ceiling depends on decisions in final third.
neu.2: Tactical analysts: correct execution; marginal gains can unlock another level.

neg.1: Question impact in big games √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù aggressive marking neutralizes him.
neg.2: Doubts about sustainability without increasing chance quality.

Prodigy.1: "Future star in the making" √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù composure beyond age.
Prodigy.2: Crowd excited: generational ceiling if development continues.

OnTheRise.1: Signs of explosion everywhere √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù rapid upward curve.
OnTheRise.2: Seems ready for a bigger stage next season.

EstablishedStar.1: Leader of {team} √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù sets the standard week after week.
EstablishedStar.2: "Absolute starter" √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù delivers even on bad days.

UnderPressure.1: "Time to prove" √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù crowd divided on patience.
UnderPressure.2: Decisive moment: needs an affirmation performance.

Journeyman.1: Reliable professional √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù keeps teams running wherever he goes.
Journeyman.2: Solid contributor; value often appears in small details.

VeteranLeader.1: Sets the tone in the dressing room √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù standards matter.
VeteranLeader.2: Mentor figure √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù influence goes beyond numbers.

ForgottenMan.1: Scarce minutes √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù needs sequence to recover rhythm.
ForgottenMan.2: On the margins; could a loan revive form?

Flop.1: Price still weighs √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù needs to turn the narrative.
Flop.2: "Below expected" √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù patience of part of the crowd runs out.

ComebackKid.1: Resilience in evidence √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù momentum growing again.
ComebackKid.2: "He's back" √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù confidence returns with each game.

CultHero.1: Soul and heart √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù connection with {team} fans is special.
CultHero.2: "Plays for the badge" √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù moments to remember.

Prodigy.1: Models project excellent trajectory √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù growth curve at top of percentile.

OnTheRise.1: Greater usage, stable efficiency √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù strong sign of sustainable evolution.

EstablishedStar.1: Peak years √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù maintains high floor and high ceiling.

UnderPressure.1: Indicators fell year over year; small sample, but trend to monitor.

Journeyman.1: Plug-and-play profile; tactical flexibility adds value to squad.

VeteranLeader.1: Intangibles claros √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù leadership stabilizes team phases.

ForgottenMan.1: Uncertain role; may need tactical adjustment or change to restart.

Flop.1: Delta vs. investment remains high; needs consistency in end product.

ComebackKid.1: Encouraging post-injury trends; physical data near pre-injury level.

CultHero.1: Impact beyond the scorecard √¢‚Ç¨‚Äù decisions in key moments and synergy with fans.

national.squadPlayer: Established as a squad player for {country} national team.

national.continentalCupSelected: Selected for European Club Cup squad!

national.seasonSummary: Earned {caps} caps for {country}, scoring {goals} goals and {assists} assists (Avg: {rating}/10).
national.milestone100caps: Reached 100 international caps for {country}! A legendary achievement.
national.milestone50intGoals: Scored 50th international goal for {country}! A historic achievement.

chemistry.multipleTrophies: Multiple trophies this season have created an incredible team spirit!
chemistry.trophyWin: Winning trophies has brought the team closer together.
chemistry.promotion: Promotion has energized the entire squad!
chemistry.relegation: Relegation has shattered team morale and unity.
chemistry.trainingIncident: Training ground incidents have damaged relationships in the squad.
chemistry.excellentForm: Excellent form has improved standing within the squad.
chemistry.injuryAbsence: Long injury absence has weakened connections with teammates.
chemistry.transferSaga: Transfer saga has created tension in the dressing room.
chemistry.belovedFigure: Has become a beloved figure in the dressing room!
chemistry.seriousIncident: A serious incident has isolated them from the squad.
chemistry.clubLegend: As a club legend, their presence is invaluable to team unity.
chemistry.lackPlayingTime: Lack of playing time has damaged relationships with teammates.

trait.oneClubMan: Became a true club legend, earning the 'One-Club Man' trait after years of loyal service.
trait.twoFooted: Years of practice have perfected their weaker foot, gaining the 'Two-Footed' trait.
trait.leadership: Developed into a natural leader, earning the 'Leadership' trait.
trait.clinicalFinisher: A lethal season in front of goal earned the 'Clinical Finisher' trait.
trait.setpieceSpecialist: Mastery of dead-ball situations earned the 'Set-piece Specialist' trait.
trait.bigGamePlayer: Proven track record in finals and crucial matches earned the 'Big Game Player' trait.
trait.injuryProne: A concerning injury history has resulted in the 'Injury Prone' trait.
trait.versatile: Years of playing different roles earned the 'Versatile' trait.
trait.powerHeader: Aerial dominance throughout the season earned the 'Power Header' trait.
trait.playmaker: Orchestrated attacks all season long, earning the 'Playmaker' trait.
trait.speedMerchant: Blistering pace has become their trademark, earning the 'Speed Merchant' trait.
trait.engine: Relentless work rate all season earned the 'Engine' trait.
trait.dribblingWizard: Mesmerizing dribbling displays earned the 'Dribbling Wizard' trait.
trait.composure: Ice-cold mentality in pressure situations earned the 'Composure' trait.

party_scandal.title: Party Scandal
party_scandal.description: Photos from a late-night party have leaked. The media is demanding a response.

outburst.title: Social Media Outburst
outburst.description: An emotional post went viral. The club is concerned.

tax.title: Tax Investigation
tax.description: Authorities are investigating your financial affairs.

nightclub.title: Nightclub Incident
nightclub.description: A confrontation at a nightclub has been reported.

relationship.title: Relationship Drama
relationship.description: Your personal life is making headlines.

charity.title: Charity Opportunity
charity.description: A children's hospital has invited you to be their ambassador.

business.title: Business Opportunity
business.description: Investors are proposing a partnership in a new venture.

mentor.title: Mentor Opportunity
mentor.description: The academy wants you to mentor young players.

fan.title: Fan Interaction
fan.description: Fans are requesting autographs and photos at a public event.

teammate.title: Teammate Conflict
teammate.description: A disagreement with a teammate has escalated.

manager.title: Manager Fallout
manager.description: The manager has criticized you in public. How do you respond?

interview.title: Controversial Interview
interview.description: A journalist asks a provocative question about your future.

mediaInterview.title: Media Interview Request
mediaInterview.description: A journalist wants to interview you about your recent performances. How do you approach it?
mediaInterview.choice_confident: Be confident and talk up your achievements
mediaInterview.choice_humble: Stay humble and credit the team
mediaInterview.choice_deflect: Keep answers short and deflect questions

fanEncounter.title: Fan Encounter
fanEncounter.description: A group of fans recognized you in public and are asking for photos and autographs.
fanEncounter.choice_engage: Spend time with them and take lots of photos
fanEncounter.choice_polite: Sign a few autographs and move on politely
fanEncounter.choice_ignore: Pretend you did not see them and keep walking

trainingDecision.title: Training Approach
trainingDecision.description: The coaching staff is letting you decide your training focus for the week.
trainingDecision.choice_extra: Put in extra sessions to improve faster
trainingDecision.choice_rest: Take it easy to recover and stay fresh

agentMeeting.title: Agent Meeting
agentMeeting.description: Your agent wants to meet to discuss your career situation and future plans.
agentMeeting.choice_focus: Tell them you want to focus on playing
agentMeeting.choice_explore: Ask about interest from other clubs

teammateInteraction.title: Teammate Bonding
teammateInteraction.description: Some teammates invited you to hang out after training. How do you respond?
teammateInteraction.choice_bond: Join them and build stronger relationships
teammateInteraction.choice_professional: Politely decline and focus on rest

managerConversation.title: Manager Conversation
managerConversation.description: The manager called you into their office to discuss your role in the team.
managerConversation.choice_commitment: Express your commitment to the team
managerConversation.choice_accept: Accept whatever role they give you

pauseMenu.title: –ú–µ–Ω—é –ø–∞—É–∑—ã
pauseMenu.confirmNewCareer: Are you sure you want to start a new career? Unsaved progress will be lost.
pauseMenu.confirmMainMenu: Are you sure you want to return to the main menu? Unsaved progress will be lost.

traits.setpieceSpecialist: Dangerous from free kicks and corners
traits.ballPlayingDefender: Comfortable on the ball and builds from back
traits.sweeperKeeper: Modern goalkeeper comfortable outside the box
traits.secondWind: Maintains energy levels late in games
traits.everPresent: Reliable performer week in, week out
traits.One-Club Man_desc: Dedicated entire career to the same club
traits.Big Game Player_desc: Rises to the occasion in important matches
traits.Set-piece Specialist_desc: Excellent at free kicks and corners
traits.Engine_desc: Tireless on the pitch, covers the whole field
traits.Right-Footed Sniper_desc: Lethal finishing with the right foot
traits.Left-Footed Maestro_desc: Refined technique with the left foot
traits.Natural Fitness_desc: Rarely gets tired and recovers quickly
traits.clinicalFinisher: Excellent finishing in front of goal
traits.longShots: Scores from distance with good accuracy
traits.targetMan: Excellent hold-up play and aerial presence
traits.speedMerchant: Electric pace on and off the ball
traits.flairPlayer: Unpredictable and creative with the ball
traits.crossingSpecialist: Delivers quality crosses from wide areas
traits.boxToBox: Covers ground and contributes at both ends
traits.engine: Tireless work rate for the full 90 minutes
traits.ballWinner: Aggressive and effective in winning possession
traits.interceptor: Reads the game and intercepts passes
traits.leadership: Natural leader on and off the pitch

types.heading: –ò–≥—Ä–∞ –ì–æ–ª–æ–≤–æ–π
types.clubTrainingDesc: Train with the club squad. Free, effectiveness based on infrastructure
types.shootingDesc: Focus on finishing, positioning and accuracy
types.playmakingDesc: Passing, game vision and creating chances

training.title: Training Center
training.investQuestion: Would you like to invest in intensive preparation?
training.alreadyInvested: You have already invested this season
training.resultExcellent: You feel like you're flying on the pitch. The investment was worth every penny.
training.resultGood: The preparation is showing results. You feel sharper.
training.resultNeutral: The preparation went as expected. You maintain your rhythm.
training.resultPoor: You feel heavy and out of rhythm. Not every investment guarantees returns.

result.exceptional: Exceptional training! You exceeded all expectations.

statusModal.formDescription: Form affects your performance on the pitch. Play well to improve!
statusModal.fitnessDescription: Physical condition affects stamina and injury recovery.
statusModal.moraleDescription: Morale affects motivation, training and career decisions.
statusModal.approvalDescription: How the board and fans view your performance.

styleDesc.Aggressive: Seeks the best possible contracts, may irritate clubs.
styleDesc.Conservative: Prioritizes stability and security in negotiations.
styleDesc.Balanced: Balances ambition with sensibility in offers.
styleDesc.Moneyfocused: Total focus on salary and financial bonuses.
styleDesc.Professional: Maintains professional stance in all negotiations.
styleDesc.Networked: Uses extensive contacts to find opportunities.
styleDesc.Visionary: Thinks long-term about the player's career.
styleDesc.Patient: Waits for the right moment to close deals.
styleDesc.Ambitious: Always seeks the biggest clubs and salaries.
styleDesc.Charismatic: Uses charm to win over directors.
styleDesc.Persistent: Never gives up until getting what they want.
styleDesc.Dedicated: Fully focused on the player's success.
styleDesc.Experienced: Uses years of experience to their advantage.
styleDesc.Analytical: Bases decisions on data and statistics.
styleDesc.Adaptable: Adjusts strategy according to the situation.
styleDesc.Motivated: Extremely motivated to get good deals.
styleDesc.Focused: Focused exclusively on the player's goals.

update.title: Update Available
update.description: A new version of the game is available with improvements and fixes!
